post.description: Use this API to get the cashier page address. After getting the cashier page address, you can redirect the user to the cashier page to make a payment.

resultCode.description:
The result code.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultStatus.description:
The result status. Valid values are:  

S: Indicates that the result status is successful. 
F: Indicates that the result status is failed. 
U: Indicates that the result status is unknown.

resultMessage.description:
The result message.

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

subscriptionId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom to identify a subscription. The value of this parameter is the value of the same parameter that is returned by notifyPayment and notifySubscription for the original subscription.

Note: Specify at least one of subscriptionId and subscriptionRequestId. A one-to-one correspondence between paymentId and paymentRequestId exists.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

subscriptionRequestId.description:
The unique ID assigned by a merchant to identify a subscription request.
Note: Specify at least one of subscriptionId and subscriptionRequestId. A one-to-one correspondence between paymentId and paymentRequestId exists.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

cancellationType.description:
The cancellation type for the subscription. Valid values are:

CANCEL: indicates canceling the subscription. The subscription service is not provided to the user after the current subscription period ends.
TERMINATE: indicates terminating the subscription. The subscription service is ceased immediately.  
More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

result.description: Indicates whether this API is called successfully. If this API is successfully called, the subscription is canceled successfully.
